Using Xamarin.Forms Shapes to notate notes on the treble clef

Sep 25, 2020 • Alwyn Lombaard

screen recording on an iPhone 6s

I played around with the new Shapes feature in Xamarin.Forms for drawing shapes without having to use SkiaSharp.

So I developed a screen using a Grid as the canvas to draw a musical staff with treble clef and note. The range is for notes on a guitar in standard tuning up the the 12th fret on the first (bottom on the guitar) string.

To make it interactive I added tap gestures to allow the user to tap on a location on the staff and find out what the note is.

Here is the layout
